ygData.subject: RE: Testament of Vanear - hint for Dark Elf Clerics  *small spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: the problem is that people are reporting that one of the cards you need to get a page is missing now.....so you cant get one of the pages or the book
ygData.messageBody:
the problem is that people are reporting that one of the cards you need to
get a page is missing now.....so you cant get one of the pages or the book
itself.....

-----Original Message-----
From: Sirensa Qi'Seraph [mailto:Sirensa@...]
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 2:05 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Testament of Vanear - hint for Dark Elf Clerics *small
spoiler*


For those of us that are Dark Elf clerics - it looks as if it is still
possible to get the Testament of Vanear - despite being disliked in Erudin
and Qeynos. You will need friends to help you though.

When the quest starts in Erudin, you (or a friend of yours if you have
someone) will be given a book, with slots and a combine button. You search
for the missing pages (or get a nice friend to help you) and put the pages
in the book. So, it appears that the Testament of Vanear is NOT formed
until you combine the items in the book. If you have a friend willing to
get the items for you - a dark elf should in theory be able to get this no
drop quest item - just don't let your friend *combine* them. You must do
that. (*note - the information I had did not say if the book or pages used
to combine were no drop - if anyone knows that they are, please let me know)


I have not tried this myself - but I think I will :) Hopefully it will
work!!

Sirensa Qi'Seraph
Cleric of the 8th Circle
Solusek Ro Server
